caption.p: Spatial variation of biomass carbon density (t C ha âˆ’1) in giant panda reserves and the matched sites outside of the reserves in ( a) 1988 and ( b) 2012. ( c) Pairwise comparisons of mean biomass carbon density inside and outside the reserves (Error bars represent standard errors). ( d) Relative change rate of mean biomass carbon density between 1988 and 2012 inside and outside of nature reserves for the lands covered by forest and all land types. Maps were made with ArcGIS version 10.2.2 for desktop ( http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis).
